website_summaries.verdict: This sleek shavette works equally well for professional barbers or first-time straight razor users. There is a slight learning curve for blade changes, but the unit feels heavy and balanced in the hand.
pros: Blade glides over face, very  "quiet" shave
Three step process holds blades firmly in place
cons: Blade requires frequent cleaning, shorter strokes only
Handle and holder can have mechanical problems

customer_reviews.title: I did like the weight to the razer but what good is ...
customer_reviews.text: The problem i have is that the blade falls right off. I tried adjusting the classic samurai straight razor and yet the blade falls right off. I did like the weight to the razer but what good is it if it doesn't work. Unsure if this was a defective one or what. I guess you get what you pay for. Hope this was helpful to others considering purchasing this item. Contacted seller and let them know of the problem. They offered to replace the defective razor at no cost or refund. I figured might as well give it another chance so i requested the metal finish razor. It works great! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it, he recommends
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this item for his facial grooming. He says it's awesome and he loves it. Blade quality overall is good and he uses it on a regular basis. He has had this blade for several months now. He also says they clean easily and he would recommend to any man for close facial trimming. At first he was a bit skeptical about using on his neck but he's used it enough now that he has with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great for close clean shave and fine tuning beard lines.
customer_reviews.text: Great if you are willing to take the time to learn how to use properly. Not good for a quick shave. Must take your time. You will cut yourself the first time you use it. A fresh blade will cut you also. After a couple uses of the same blade and practice it goes smoothly over your skin without cutting you. Get a blood clotting agent like shaving chalk to stop the bleeding. Recommend watching YouTube videos on how to shave with a straight razor.
customer_reviews.author: Aarion

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could pick zero star's because this thing deserves it. The blades slide around after you have locked it in place, with a couple taps the blade falls right out. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t try this cause it looks cool.
customer_reviews.text: Well built product!! Love using it. However... Be very careful with this the first time you shave. I have a new scar on my chin from this. Been using 5 bladed razors for decades and always wanted a straight balde razor. I saw this and thought “heck yea!!!,”because the price wasn’t bad. That was until I sliced my chin open like a bag of lays potato chips with a box knife. Seriously tho, good luck if you try this. I have been practicing and slowly getting better. A lot less bloodshed and new scars to show it.
customer_reviews.author: warriors view

customer_reviews.title: Great straight razor.
customer_reviews.text: A must for anyone who wears their beard groomed with sharp angles. It's got a sleek look, is confortable to hold, and comes with so many replacement blades that I may never have to buy any.
customer_reviews.author: rogerjrod

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this razor for YEARS. It was my first straight razor and its never failed me, the cap to the blade holder became a little loose but its really nothing to have a problem over, its not broken, it works perfectly. 100% recommend to anyone whoa starting out using a straight razor.
customer_reviews.author: raul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp! Works perfectly, no issues. Need experience in use or you will cut whatever you are shaving for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: First time using this type of razor. Getting the top open to be able to slide in razors is really snug. I kind of wish there was a release of some sort. It’s especially awkward when taking the blade out. Seems kind of dangerous. Like I said, I’m a rookie and maybe just need to get used to it and get a feel for the razor.
customer_reviews.author: Luis hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Wore out quickly (meaning it no longer holds the blade in place- the blade pushes back up into the holder every time). I have a similar razor from a different company that is actually older and still holds the blade better than this one.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

I'm not going back for disposable razors, this is the way to go if looking for a nice sharp shave at a really low cost and eco-friendly.

When the blade just falls out all random i didn't have this problem the first time it wasn't till like the 3rd time replacing the blades.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing way to shave as long as you are patient

I watched multiple youtube videos before shaving, and it helped tremendously in terms of me not cutting myself with the blade. It really is the most cost-efficient and fun, good-looking way to shave. I use it to line up my beard as well and the clean lines are phenomenal and look professional.
customer_reviews.author: G. Q.

customer_reviews.title: The part you hold it by feels uncomfortably short. ...
customer_reviews.text: The part you hold it by feels uncomfortably short. I have small hands and it feels crowded. The reason I am giving it an even lower rating is because it doesn't even hold a blade straight. If you line up your blade into the notches it gives you and close it the blade sits diagonally. How difficult it is to open and close is also a big safety issue. If you're changing a razor blade you don't want to be struggling to get it out. I work in a barbershop and I will tell you save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.

customer_reviews.title: Been working great for me! Blades are nice and Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Just recently started shaving with a straight razor. Love it, I mean you have to be extra careful. I think this one has been very nice in my opinion. I'm sure its not as nice as an actual straight razor, but I wasn't expecting it to be. Plus I like the disposable blades!

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken. Would not snap into alignment.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time with a razor of this kind which only exacerbated the problem of the razor not being aligned correctly when it arrived. It was made worse because I did not know enough about these razors to know that it was not functioning properly. The two bumps would not align with the holes they were supposed to snap into. Therefore I ended up using this misaligned razor for a week before I realized my inability to shave safely and correctly was not entirely my fault. Would recommend going with a different brand.

product_meta.title: Classic Samurai CS-102MB Stainless Steel Matte Black Finish Professional Barber Straight Edge Shavette Cut Throat Razor with 100 Shark Razor Blades
product_meta.description:
Size:Matte Black + 100 Shark Blades

Classic Samurai Professional straight edge barber razor with Japanese quality is made from genuine surgical grade stainless steel! Perfect for Barbershop and Personal Usage. It offers another great option for a decent wet shave. It allows you get a quality straight razor barber style shave without all of the maintenance of a fixed straight edge razor. A new style of shaving without investing a lot of money. A great gift for someone who has mentioned interest in wet shaving.

Classic Samurai Shaving Razor Kit comes with 100 Shark Single Edge Razor Blades which give you at least a year’s worth of shaves. Making this one of the most economical choices out there.

It has the flipable blade lock like other shavettes that allows for quick and easy blade changes. It works with single edge razor blades which you can easily snap your favorite double edge blade in half to create one.



Classic Samurai Straight Razor Instructions :

 * Prepare your face well for the shave.
 * Taking a hot shower or washing your face with warm water helps remove the natural oils off your face allowing your beard hairs to absorb more water and soften.
 * Also use a pre-shave oil underneath your favorite shaving cream. This will help lubricate your skin so the blade slides easier and reduces irritation.
 * Pull you skin tight, especially in problem areas like under your nose or on your chin. This will help reduce nicks.
 * Using a 30-degree angle, take slow, strokes with the grain. Going against the grain can cause razor burn.


Compatible With : Astra,Shark, Lord, Derby and all other single and double edge safety razor blades.
feature_bullets: [GENUINE & RUST FREE] Surgical Grade Stainless Steel. Smooth Matte Black Handle that helps prevent the razor from rusting and offer a comfortable grip. Minimizes Cuts.
[GREAT QUALITY] for Barbershop and Personal Usage, A great option for beginners.
[100% SAFE] Flippable blade lock like other shavettes that allows for quick and easy blade changes. Exchangeable Blade Technology allows to remove old blades to replace with fresh ones.

[COMPATIBLE WITH] Astra, Shark, Lord, Derby all straight and double edge razor blades. The Kit includes : 100 Single Edge Razor Blades. Each blade is individually wax paper wrapped. The Shavette comes in a plastic pouch for Protection.

[MONEY BACK GUARANTEE] We're 100% committed to providing you with a top-notch customer experience. If there's anything that didn't go right with your order or if you feel our straight edge razor is not for you, please contact us and we will help you immediately with anything you need.
